Entry.JapaneseText: 民家
Entry.EnglishText: Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: アニカマル・民家
Entry.EnglishText: Anikamal ・Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: アニカマル
Entry.EnglishText: Anikamal

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の人
Entry.EnglishText: Man

Entry.JapaneseText: お、お助け……!!
Entry.EnglishText: H-Help...!!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマはオアシスにでも 行って、バイラスどもに 食われちまえばいいのさ！
Entry.EnglishText: If Humas stayed any longer in the Oasis, they'll get eaten by Veirases!

Entry.JapaneseText: おじいさん
Entry.EnglishText: Old Man

Entry.JapaneseText: よそ者は好かん！ 出てってもらおう……！
Entry.EnglishText: You outsiders have no place in this village! Leave!

Entry.JapaneseText: よ、寄るな…… 病気がうつる……！
Entry.EnglishText: St-Stand back! I'll catch your illness!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヨソものは いつも厄介事を運んでくる…… それに変わりはない。
Entry.EnglishText: All outsiders like you always bring something horrible! You're all the same!

Entry.JapaneseText: じゃが、困っている者を 見過ごすのは人として 間違いじゃった……
Entry.EnglishText: Yet, I was wrong for turning a blind eye to those in need of help...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……勘弁してくれ。
Entry.EnglishText: Forgive me...

Entry.JapaneseText: お、おまえ……近寄るな！ せっかく、ベルデ草のお香で 気分を鎮めておるのに……
Entry.EnglishText: Stand back! I was already in a good mood thanks to the Belde grass and then you came...

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえが近くに来たとたん、 全身の毛が逆立つような怒りが こみ上げて来るんじゃ！
Entry.EnglishText: Whenever you come closer I can feel my hair ruffling up in rage!

Entry.JapaneseText: ふう……ヒューマと話すと ほっとするわい……
Entry.EnglishText: Haah... Talking with you Humas is really relieving.

Entry.JapaneseText: どうもガジュマが近づくだけで 攻撃的になってしまうんじゃ。
Entry.EnglishText: Just being near Gajumas always make me aggressive.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマと以前のように 仲良くやっていけるか……
Entry.EnglishText: Do you think we can get along with Gajuma like before...?

Entry.JapaneseText: これから、それを 探っていかねばの……
Entry.EnglishText: I suppose we'll have to learn to find out...

Entry.JapaneseText: 以前と同じ……関係というのは むずかしいのかもしれんな……
Entry.EnglishText: It might be hard to rebuild the relationship we had before...

Entry.JapaneseText: 互いの憎しみや差別意識を 知ってしまった今となっては…… どうすればよいものやら……
Entry.EnglishText: Now that we're finally aware of each other's hatred and discrimination, I wonder what we should do?

Entry.JapaneseText: 遠くから聞こえるこの地鳴り…… どこかで何か、大変な事が 起きているような気がする……
Entry.EnglishText: This rumbling coming from somewhere far... I wonder if something horrible had happened somewhere?

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマたちが、 ワシに謝って来たんじゃ……
Entry.EnglishText: The Gajumas came and apologized to us...

Entry.JapaneseText: わだかまりがあるのは仕方ないが、 前向きに努力したいと…… もちろん、ワシも同意したよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Of course, some ill-will is inevitable, but I want to look at it in a better way... I also forgave them, of course...

Entry.JapaneseText: この村は年寄りが多いんじゃ。 だからみんな、助け合って 生きて行かねばならん……
Entry.EnglishText: There are many old people in this village, so everyone has to help each other to survive.

Entry.JapaneseText: おばあさん
Entry.EnglishText: Grandma

Entry.JapaneseText: すみません…… うちのおじいさんは よそから来た人が嫌いで……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm sorry, my husband doesn't really like outsiders...

Entry.JapaneseText: ひっ……！
あ、ご、ごめんなさい…… で、でも病気が……
Entry.EnglishText: Ah, I-I'm sorry... The d-disease...

Entry.JapaneseText: 村のみんなが、かたくなな 心をほどいてくれて…… 本当によかったです……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm really glad that everyone's heart has lightened...

Entry.JapaneseText: 私に近寄らないでください……！ あ、あなたがそばに来るだけで 心が暴れるんです……！
Entry.EnglishText: P-Please don't come any closer! My heart just gets faster whenever you get close...!

Entry.JapaneseText: この村もすっかり 変わってしまいました……
Entry.EnglishText: This village has changed completely...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマとガジュマが 顔を合わせようものなら たちまちケンカが始まります……
Entry.EnglishText: Whenever Humas and Gajumas see each other, there's always bound to be a fight...

Entry.JapaneseText: どうか、お気をつけて……
Entry.EnglishText: Please be careful...

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだか、少しだけ、 村の雰囲気が落ち着いたような 気がします……
Entry.EnglishText: For some reason, I feel like the village's atmosphere has calmed down somewhat...

Entry.JapaneseText: 私も、ちょっと前よりは 気分が落ち着いています……
Entry.EnglishText: Even my mood has also improved compared to before!

Entry.JapaneseText: 村の騒ぎが収まったたら、 今度はこの地響き……
この国はどうなって、 しまったんでしょう……
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder what's happening to this country...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 世の中はおかしくなって しまいましたが、この村は きっと大丈夫です……
Entry.EnglishText: This world might have grown stranger, but I'm sure this village with be safe...

Entry.JapaneseText: 新しい村になろうと、みんなが 努力し始めたんですから……
Entry.EnglishText: Because everyone has started to make an effort to changing this village!

Entry.JapaneseText: この村は若い人が少ないです。 若者たちは街にあこがれて この村を出て行きました。
Entry.EnglishText: There's a lot of old people here. All the young ones have left yearning for citylife.

Entry.JapaneseText: でもこの村の良さに気づき、 彼らが戻って来るだろう日を 私たちは待ってるのです。
Entry.EnglishText: But I'm waiting for the day when they realize the perks of living here and return.

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の人
Entry.EnglishText: Man

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:39000002>おい！ ヒューマは入ってくるな！ ここは今日から俺の家だ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:39000002>Hey! Huma ain't allowed in here! Starting from today, this house is mine!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:39000003>今日から……？ どういう事だ？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:39000003>From today? What's that supposed to mean?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:39000004>ヒューマのジジイとババアから 頂いたのさ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:39000004>An old Huma geezer and his wife used to own it, but I took it off their hands.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:39000005>そのじいさんとばあさんは どうしたんだ……？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:39000005>Then what happened to them?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:39000006>なんだよ、うるせえな！ 追い出したに決まってるだろ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:39000006>What's with these annoying questions? I chased them outta here, obviously!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:39000007>えっ……追い出した？ でも、この周りは砂漠しか……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:39000007>Wait...chased out? But there is nothing but desert for miles...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:39000008>あんな危ない砂漠に、 年寄りを放り出したってのかよ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:39000008>You drove out an elderly couple into a desert as dangerous as this one!?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:39000009>どこへ行ったんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:39000009>Where did they go?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3900000a>た、た、たぶんオアシスに……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3900000A>P-probably the oasis...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3900000b>あそこはバイラスの巣窟だ。 普通に暮らす事など……！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3900000B>That's a Veiras nest. If they stay there for too long...!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3900000c>オアシスへ急ぐぞ……！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3900000C>To the oasis, hurry!

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><scale:0140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><scale:0140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><scale:0140><speed:00><font:80000002><Unk19:3404>が仲間になりました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><scale:0140><speed:00><Unk19:3404> joined the party.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><scale:0140><speed:00><font:80000002><Unk19:3410>が同行します。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><scale:0140><speed:00><Unk19:3410> is now travelling with you.

Entry.JapaneseText: notice
Entry.EnglishText: Notice
